mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yuangong_id as yuangongId ,a.kehu_id as kehuId ,a.goutong_name as goutongName ,a.goutong_types as goutongTypes ,a.goutong_time as goutongTime ,a.goutong_content as goutongContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,kehu.yuangong_id as kehuYuangongId ,kehu.kehu_name as kehuName ,kehu.kehu_phone as kehuPhone ,kehu.kehu_id_number as kehuIdNumber ,kehu.kehu_photo as kehuPhoto ,kehu.sex_types as sexTypes ,kehu.kehu_email as kehuEmail ,kehu.kehu_jifen_number as kehuJifenNumber ,kehu.kehu_content as kehuContent ,yuangong.yuangong_name as yuangongName ,yuangong.yuangong_phone as yuangongPhone ,yuangong.yuangong_id_number as yuangongIdNumber ,yuangong.yuangong_photo as yuangongPhoto ,yuangong.yuangong_email as yuangongEmail ,yuangong.jinyong_types as jinyongTypes
FROM goutong a left JOIN kehu kehu ON a.kehu_id = kehu.id left JOIN yuangong yuangong ON a.yuangong_id = yuangong.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yuangong_id = #{params.yuangongId} or kehu.yuangong_id = #{params.yuangongId} )
and ( a.kehu_id = #{params.kehuId} )
and a.goutong_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.goutongName},'%')
and a.goutong_types = #{params.goutongTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.goutong_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.goutongTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.goutong_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.goutongTimeEnd})
and a.goutong_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.goutongContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.kehu_id IS NOT NULL
and kehu.kehu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuName},'%')
and kehu.kehu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuPhone},'%')
and kehu.kehu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuIdNumber},'%')
and kehu.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and kehu.kehu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuEmail},'%')
and kehu.kehu_jifen_number >= #{params.kehuJifenNumberStart}
and kehu.kehu_jifen_number <= #{params.kehuJifenNumberEnd}
and kehu.kehu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(kehu.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(kehu.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yuangong_id IS NOT NULL
and yuangong.yuangong_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongName},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongPhone},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongIdNumber},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongEmail},'%')
and yuangong.jinyong_types = #{params.jinyongTypes}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
